mapper.select: SELECT id ,user_id ,notice_title, notice_updated, hit_count FROM ( SELECT id, notice_title,user_id, notice_updated, hit_count FROM noticeboard ORDER BY id DESC ) AS noticeboard ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{offset},#{perPage};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeboard( user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_created, notice_updated ) VALUES(#{userId},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent},now(),now());
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeboard SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_updated = now(), notice_state = #{noticeState} WHERE id = #{id};
